title: Letterhead, "IBM Think", ca. 1956
markings: Watermark: STRATHMORE WRITING/ 25% COTTON FIBER U.S.A.
inscribed: Imprinted in blue ink, upper left corner: Think; imprinted in black ink, upper left quadrant, on diagonal slant (up from left to right): The IBM Magazine/ One Barker Avenue, White Plains/ New York 10601; lower left quadrant, on diagonal slant: Published by/ International Business Machines/ Corporation/ Editor:     914 686 5900/ Managing Editor:  914 686 5202/ Art Director:     914 686 5206/ Internal calls: tie line 236.
description: Cream letterhead. Imprinted in blue (large font), upper left corner, "Think." Imprinted in black ink, diagonally (up from left to right), beneath "Think", company name and address.  Lower left corner,imprinted diagonally, publishers name and the editor's and art director's phone numbers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "IBM Think", ca. 1956.
ca. 1956. Offset lithograph on cream paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-60.
